sentence: In the past, he has challenged Tim Ryan in the 13th District, running as a Republican.
author: Jerica Rogers
title: Congressional candidates file petitions for May primary

sentence: WASHINGTON, D.C. — U.S. Reps. Tim Ryan, D-13 Ohio, and Bill Johnson, R-6 Ohio, introduced legislation Thursday that would lead to the Youngstown-Warren Regional Airport (YNG) and Youngstown Air Reserve Station (YARS) being designated as a primary airport.
title: Legislation Would Designate YNG/YARS as a ‘Primary Airport’

sentence: U.S. Reps. Tim Ryan, D-Howland, and Bill Johnson, R-Marietta, introduced legislation that would designate any airport in use by an air reserve station as a “primary airport.” The change in the United States Code would allow the Youngstown-Warren Regional Airport and Youngstown Air Reserve Station to be once again designated as a primary airport.
title: Thur. 10:15 a.m.: Legislators join forces to increase airport funding
